title: Recordación florida : discurso historial y demostración natural, material, militar y política del reyno de Guatemala
author: F. A. de Fuentes y Guzmán
description: 3 volumes illustrations, maps (some folded) plates (1 folded) facsimiles, 27 cm
note: = vols 6–8 series *Biblioteca 'Goathemala' de la Sociedad de Geografía e Historia de Guatemala* / Part 1 = 17 libs, part 2 = 14 libs / Incomplete part 1 published in 2 vols as [Madrid, L. Navarro, 1882–1883]
